sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup,Validators } from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { loginForm = new FormGroup({ 'username': new FormControl(null, [Validators.required]), 'password': new FormControl(null) }) checkLogin(){ const regValues:any = this.loginForm.value; } }
